title.text: Effect of Out Of Vocabulary terms on inferring eligibility criteria fora retrospective study in Hebrew EHR

datasetContent.text: An SVM classifier was trained using the 200 most common nouns as features.
The noun lemmas were extracted with the morphological disambiguator in two settings: naïve setting using the newswire lexicon and an adapted setting using the acquired lexicon.
We divided the corpus into training and testing sets of equal size, we report on the average results or 10 different divisions of the data.
